```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(kableExtra)
dt <- read.csv("/Users/Tal/Desktop/c101/static/data/feedback.csv")
kable(dt) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"))
```
